data.description: QueryIndexManager._atomic_write_json has the same race condition pattern as VersionedStore._save_version(). Multiple threads writing to .json.tmp files and racing to rename. Fix by adding threading.Lock similar to VersionedStore fix in commit 584c310e. This will enable the remaining skipped test: test_parallel_index_reads_during_writes.
data.title: Fix QueryIndexManager race condition in _atomic_write_json
